content: 60 double_crochet diameter should be 6 00 after this round round 7- chain 2 2 double_crochet in first st 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1dc in next 5 double_crochet 3 more times 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet and in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 64 double_crochet diameter should be approx 6 75 after this round round 8-20- chain 2 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet you should have enough rounds at after round 20 so that the hat height is 8 ½ if not add more of this round until hat is 8 ½ and then continue to round 21 round 21- chain 1 1 very loosely single_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in open space between chain 1 and first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends with flower multi colors or add bow from pattern above stripes
